subject: How to ignore tests from MethodRule
msgSnippet: Hey I am trying to ignore tests from a MethodRule but the only way I have found to do that is to use AssumptionViolatedExcption which I don t really like. Is
messageBody:
Hey

I am trying to ignore tests from a MethodRule but the only way I have found to do that is to use AssumptionViolatedExcption which I don't really like. Is there a way to use a Statement that would cause the test to be ignored.

Like e.g return new IgnoreTest(statement, "Reason")

Best regards

Rune
